hs_fortunes.fortune: "Win10's Cortana is just another incarnation of Jezebel."
"The best resting place for ＡＬＬ instances of Windows 10\nis the deepest pits of Hell."
"Win10's telemetry is part of Astaroth's covert operations."
"Let's all compare Bill Gates to King Ahab!"
"Stoke Hell's fires to make space for those who developed MS Windows!"
"There's not enough space in Hell for Microsoft's propagandists!"
"The Gates couple is a modern Jezebel and Ahab.\nA fictitious Iranian exorcist"
"Install Linux to avoid an eternity with all the Windows developers."
